name: Bomb's Up
description:
Brackeys Jam 2020 game submission. It was a team effort, composed of : PxGluz(me), MeHigh and Carol03x

NOTICE: IF THE WEBGL DOESN'T WORK, WE HAVE A DOWNLOADABLE (We're having some trouble with our WebGL Builder...)

Join the the tiny mage in his adventure through the dungeon, and make use of his talent of rewinding time, while also using an arsenal of modifiers to your main weapon, A TIMED BOMB.

MECHANICS:

  • A timed bomb that has to make contact with the player in order to explode (stay withing the circle placed with left mouse button to make the bomb explode)
  • Rewind to a previous location so you can get a more advantageous position (can be used to get into position to trigger a bomb)
  • Randomly generated dungeons, with 10 different weapons scattered around the shops!

CONTROLS

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • E - Interact
  • Tab - Open mini map
  • Left Click - Place bombs
  • R - Rewind

Music and sounds were made with a sound generator and the song can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJs_qShUo1E
